mapper.sql: fid, fnumber, fenable, fstatus, fcreateorgid, forgid, fcreatorid, fcreatetime, fmodifyorgid, fmodifierid, fmodifytime, flogo, fdisablerid, fdisabledate, fmasterid, fsimplespell, ftwocountrycode, fthreecountrycode, fformatplanid, fareacode, fname, ffullname, fdescription, fissystem, fnumericcode, ftimezone, fregionalformat
mapper.select:
SELECT
FROM t_bd_country ORDER BY fid DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO t_bd_country (fid, fnumber, fenable, fstatus, fcreateorgid, forgid, fcreatorid, fcreatetime, fmodifyorgid, fmodifierid, fmodifytime, flogo, fdisablerid, fdisabledate, fmasterid, fsimplespell, ftwocountrycode, fthreecountrycode, fformatplanid, fareacode, fname, ffullname, fdescription, fissystem, fnumericcode, ftimezone, fregionalformat) VALUES (#{id}, #{number}, #{enable}, #{status}, #{createorgid}, #{orgid}, #{creatorid}, #{createtime}, #{modifyorgid}, #{modifierid}, #{modifytime}, #{logo}, #{disablerid}, #{disabledate}, #{masterid}, #{simplespell}, #{twocountrycode}, #{threecountrycode}, #{formatplanid}, #{areacode}, #{name}, #{fullname}, #{description}, #{issystem}, #{numericcode}, #{timezone}, #{regionalformat})

mapper.update: UPDATE t_bd_country SET fnumber = #{number}, fenable = #{enable}, fstatus = #{status}, fcreateorgid = #{createorgid}, forgid = #{orgid}, fcreatorid = #{creatorid}, fcreatetime = #{createtime}, fmodifyorgid = #{modifyorgid}, fmodifierid = #{modifierid}, fmodifytime = #{modifytime}, flogo = #{logo}, fdisablerid = #{disablerid}, fdisabledate = #{disabledate}, fmasterid = #{masterid}, fsimplespell = #{simplespell}, ftwocountrycode = #{twocountrycode}, fthreecountrycode = #{threecountrycode}, fformatplanid = #{formatplanid}, fareacode = #{areacode}, fname = #{name}, ffullname = #{fullname}, fdescription = #{description}, fissystem = #{issystem}, fnumericcode = #{numericcode}, ftimezone = #{timezone}, fregionalformat = #{regionalformat} WHERE fid = #{id}

fnumber = #{number},
